data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The first reason why people don't vote is simple: they just are not interested. Another reason lies in that they don't understand enough about the government, the election process, or individual party policies. The most effective way to encourage people to vote is to find issues that people really care about. For example, changes in medical systems or education systems. Providing guidance for them on how to vote is also important.（71 字）
data.referenceText: Some people choose not to vote in government elections, why do you think this happens? What can be done to address this problem?
data.referenceTranslate: 有些人选择不参加政府选举，你认为为什么会发生这种情况? 我们可以做些什么来解决这个问题?
